A G

A

Actions.xml - Shows details about updating and setting up customizing the actions.xml file.
 

G

getPlayerAccess(uid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the Access level of the player.
getPlayerByName(name) - LuaScript Function.
The function to obtain a player based on its name.
getPlayerDepotItems(uid, depotid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the number of items in the player's depot.
getPlayerFood(uid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the hunger value of the player.
getPlayerFreeCap(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the amount of unused capacity of the player.
getPlayerGuildId(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the guild id of the player.
getPlayerGuildName(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the guild name of the player.
getPlayerGuildNick(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the player's nick in the guild the player is in.
getPlayerGuildRank(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the player's rank in the guild the player is in.
getPlayerHealth(uid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the current health value of the player.
getPlayerItemCount(cid,itemid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the number value of how many items of the requested item is on the player.
getPlayerLevel(uid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the player's level.
getPlayerLight(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the light status of the player.
getPlayerMagLevel(uid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the player's magic level.
getPlayerMana(uid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the current amount of mana of the player.
getPlayerMasterPos(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Used to return the master position of the player. (Use getPlayerTemple(cid))
getPlayerName(uid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the name of the player.
getPlayerSex(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the sex of the player.
getPlayerPosition(uid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the current position of the player.
getPlayerSlotItem(cid, slot) - LuaScript Function.
Returns what is in the selected item slot.
getPlayerSkill(uid,skillid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the skill of the requested skill type.
getPlayerSoul(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the current soul amount of the player.
getPlayerTown(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the town id of the player.
getPlayerVocation(cid) - LuaScript Function.
Returns the id of the vocation of the player.
